rows.label: tlk41700121_07_msg0001
rows.name:
Right now, everyone in Torigo has
come out to build homes
for the refugees.

rows.label: tlk41700121_07_msg0002
rows.name:
Living in tents inside the Superbian military's
Torigo Base must be hard on them...

rows.label: tlk41700121_07_msg0003
rows.name:
Some are grieving, some are angry, but
they won't find any peace of mind until they
have a roof over their heads.
